definition: generic name for hemp, flax etc/hemp or flax fiber for textile materials/sesame/CL:縷|缕[lu:3]/(of materials) rough or coarse/pocked/pitted/to have pins and needles or tingling/to feel numb

sentences.english: This is the web page of Department of Anaesthesia, Monash University.
sentences.chinese: 這是曼納士大學麻醉學系的網頁。

sentences.english: The state medical examiner and chair ofanaesthesiology settled on a series of three drug injections.
sentences.chinese: 醫療審查者和麻醉學機構確定了安樂死的三個步驟。

sentences.english: The study is in the October issue of Anesthesiology.
sentences.chinese: 研究發表在十月版的麻醉學上。

sentences.english: The study is in the British Journal of Anaesthesia.
sentences.chinese: 這項研究發表於英國麻醉學雜誌。

sentences.english: Luckily , in 2004 , i was admitted into peking union medicalcollege , majoring anesthesiology.
sentences.chinese: 2004年順利考取了中國協和醫科大學麻醉學專業。

sentences.english: Bailliere's Best Practice & Research in Clinical Anaesthesiology.
sentences.chinese: 貝勒臨牀麻醉學最佳實踐與研究。

sentences.english: "The art and science of anesthesiology is choosing the right dose," he said.
sentences.chinese: “麻醉學的奧妙在於選擇合適的劑量，”他說。

sentences.english: It is very necessary for the rapid development of anesthesiology to train considerable high-level qualified anesthetists.
sentences.chinese: 麻醉學的快速發展離不開高水平人才的培養。

sentences.english: This is the website of Global Anesthesiology Server Network.
sentences.chinese: 這是全球麻醉學服務網。

sentences.english: Also included are an anesthesiology chapter and patient selection criteria.
sentences.chinese: 此外包括是一麻醉學章和病患選擇標準。

sentences.english: He hired a new consultant in anaesthetics .
sentences.chinese: 他僱用了一名新的麻醉學顧問醫生。

sentences.english: "The art and science of anesthesiology is choosing the right dose, " he said.
sentences.chinese: 他說“麻醉學的奧妙在於選擇合適的劑量”。

sentences.english: The use of animals has been central to the development of anaesthetics.
sentences.chinese: 使用動物對於發展麻醉學具有至關重要的作用。
